name: Poker Tour Cam Lite
description:
With the Poker Tour Cam, you can make your weekly home poker game look like a televised event!

Snap a new photo or add the graphic overlays to an existing photo and your friends will wonder why they never caught you on TV! You can even add artificial TV scan lines to add to the illusion!

The "Lite" version of this app adds a watermark that is not present in the full version. Upgrade for the total effect!

Features:
* Customizable names for both players
* Customizable actions (bet, raise, re-raise, all in, etc)
* Specify the cards for each player and the flop, turn and river
* Automatic calculation of each player's odds
